snippet: The Carlyle Group has hired Matthew J. O’Connor from General Electric as a new co-head of its power investments group, the latest move to expand its energy practice.
abstract: The Carlyle Group has hired Matthew J. O’Connor from General Electric as a new co-head of its power investments group, the latest move to expand its energy practice.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Hires G.E. Executive for Power Investment Team
